caption: Incredible drinks, delicious food, great atmosphere, good service. Highly recommend the espresso martini. Go here!
Beautiful patio and delicious food!
service,drinks,food atmosphere are utterly superb... our server,Debbie picked out our drinks. Every!Single! One!Was!Amazing!

Its a lovely café and bar that has really become a go-to-spot for my friends and I. The drinks are new, fresh and original. The menu changes seasonally so getting bored is not an option here. (Try the pasta!) The patio is spacious and the décor almost makes you feel as though you’re somewhere by the beach. Inside is the main bar and center of it all- where the magic happens. Downstairs takes you into a cool, speak-easy vibe. You get a feel for everything at Residents. The aesthetic, atmosphere, energy and above all— the employees are fantastic. I feel at home every time I walk in. Must see, must try!

Update since my last visit, I noticed 2 things here: 1. this place suffers from the same issue that many former great local spot in DC did. Hype brings more people, and servers become overwhelmed as service and your experience quality decreases accordingly. 2. They remove dishes from their menu based on season, including the hyped up signature dishes that have excited people. So that in my mind could be a setback.  I recommend this place for a lovely brunch and a cocktail. They seem very attentive, service is not slow per reduced capacity. The food is meticulously prepared and looks appetizing. I enjoyed their Mediterranean dishes which are prepared with nice spices and are delicious.

I went for Sunday brunch and the food, service, decor, and ambiance were impeccable. I got the market plate with schnitzel instead of bacon (with the server kindly let me substitute). Honestly, one of the overall best dining experiences I’ve had in DC. The food is pricey just like any trendy place in the city, but I’ll definitely be back with friends when it gets warmer to try their cute patio and more of their menu!

Amazing meals that are both tasty and aesthetically prepared so well. My go to is the Residents Bowl and sharing the Turkish eggs. Have been quite a few evenings for drinks and the  creativity of the seasonal creations always keep me curious and coming back for more. The staff is so warm and welcoming, Covid protocol always in place and the design of the outdoor and indoor seating is the best in DC! Cozy ski cabin vibes in the winter and refreshing beach patio in the summer! Favorite spot in DC and as an immigrant myself, really appreciate the vision behind this treasure!
This place provides a fun tropical atmosphere.
Grill and chill!
Great drinks and great outdoor seating. Can be quite pricey and also have to put a deposit for a reservation. Nice place to grab drinks tho.
LOVE THIS PLACE! The risotto was incredible and the drinks were great. The service was also very friendly and attentive. Highly recommend!
Amazing food and even better drinks 💯🇷🇸
Incredible dining experience! The atmosphere is unlike any other and gives off a real cool vibe. We’ve been here a few times now and we continue to have amazing experiences.
(Translated by Google) Excellent place  (Original) Exelente lugar
By far the best place for bites and drinks. New to the scene, residents flipped DC upside down and changed the standards for going out.

One of the best Bar/Restaurants you could enjoy in DC. Perfect atmosphere, Music, Hospitality, staff & of course the quality of food and drinks would more than astonishing.  Thank you Residence for making my day. 🙂😘  Debbie was really amazing in all aspects.  Thank you Debbie.

I can’t decide if I like Residents more pre-COVID or during COVID because it’s spectacular both ways.  Let’s start with the ambiance. The ambiance is calming and welcoming. I’ve been struggling to find a place where I could dine outside AND have a nice, cozy environment. Oh, and especially one that’s warm-ish in this frigid winter!! Look no more. Residents has the most beautiful set up and for a split second, I felt like I was on a European vacation with friends.  Next up, the drinks. Oh, boy the drinks. Let’s just say I didn’t intend on drinking but they are too delicious to pass up. I had a nonalcoholic espresso martini which was everything I needed in this world. Wish I could have one of these every morning. The Quince was the star of the show. My friends each got one, and we were not disappointed. It was a delicious blend of a whiskey sour and a hot toddy as one described it. We also had the matcha tea, glass of champagne, cranberry seasonal cocktail, and ginger seasonal cocktail - all so tasty.  Now the food... oh my goodness the food!! We got the smashed avocado toast, market plate, and carbonara - added meat to all of them. I was so happy with my avocado smash but needed to have a bit from everyone’s dish. The food is sourced locally so everything tastes incredibly fresh and filled with bold tastes. My goodness, I did not expect that I’d eat so much. We even ordered the toasted pumpkin bread for dessert. For the record, I hate pumpkin everything but bc I trusted what this place was doing, I had to try it when Debbie (best server ever) brought it out. Let’s just say no crumbs were left behind.  And finally, my experience would have been great but it was elevated by both Debbie and Moody. Two genuine people who truly enjoy their job. Both so personable, filled with wittiness and kindness. If you get them as your servers, please take care of them - I promise they’ll go above and beyond for you!
Best service, food, cocktails, music, ambience... can’t stop giving compliments. Residents is what we needed and very much need in DC!
Every cocktail is absolutely delicious and the grilled octopus, wow!  Been our favorite spot in DC since our first visit in July. Honestlt have never had anything here we didn't like.

The place is as nice as advertised, food is great and drinks are not watered down, I think that they have great potential to be THE spot in that area but they gotta do some touch-ups here and there, I did give suggestions to staff which they took in a welcoming manner, 1 more thing: it was a bit chilly outside and they offered us blankets which we took.

The place offers a good atmosphere to go and hangout for a few hours. The drinks are good (not sure about the food or even if they have food). The music does not start until late so you can have a conversation if that is what you are looking to do. Drinks are hand made and the music is authentic, 5 rooms to choose from. Don't miss it .

What a weird, almost horrible dinning experience. Our server Moody really saved the day here which is why we’re at 3 stars. We made reservations for 8PM and arrived a few minutes early. We notified the host upon arrival and watched 3 or 4 groups get seated before we were finally seated at around 8:20. Maybe they had reservations as well, IDK but there seemed to be some tables open during our wait.  We ordered everything at once, apps, drinks and entrees and was delighted the apps came out within 10 minutes, so far so good... another 30 minutes go by, our server Moody who was awesome, suggest more drinks we oblige but still not entrees. Another 30 minutes go by still no entrees, more drink suggestions we declined. I literally walk to Shack Shack down the street to get food after waiting around 1:15 minutes between our apps and entrees. To clarify one of those entrees was a salad!!! I honestly was starving which is why I left and came back to find out entrees, which by the way are tiny portions and over priced. Our server credited a couple drinks and really tried his best to make it make sense. Ultimately we made reservations for 8PM for seated at 8:20, apps within 10 minutes and entrees came out close to 10PM. If it wasn’t for our server we all would’ve grabbed the check and left.  Maybe this is an isolated incident and honestly the food was flavorful. Regardless between the wait, the portions size and prices I’m not sure I’ll be stopping in again.
The sangria pitcher is great.
Amazing food, drinks and service! Can't wait to come back again soon :)
Great place, amazing cocktail and also food...

Both the staff and the restaurant make for an amazing atmosphere. The food and the cocktails are off the charts. If you're going on a date, or just hanging out with your friends, you're in for a great night!

Simply, yet beautifully and tastefully decorated patio, with attention to details it's just the prequel to a great culinary experience.. From dinner to breakfast.. Turkish eggs, wet machiatto and others are just some of the dishes I enjoy here
The staff and the atmosphere is wonderful
Covid-19 has been a curse to restaurants around the country, but a blessing to the outdoor vibe at Residents.  Best drinks in the DMV and it isn’t close.  Service is equally top notch.

A diamond in the middle of the urban sprawl. Service is excellent, manager (Boyan) made us feel relaxed and treated us like family even though it was our first time here.  Drinks are international class, music is excellent, service is attentive and authentic.

We had a wonderful experience at Residents.  The cocktails were truly outstanding, particularly the Penicillin, and the food was killer too.  Service and ambiance was top notch as well. Will be returning soon.
Great drinks. The smoothest coffee. And delicious small plates. Will be back again.
Sublime tastes from both the drinks and food menus. Staff were great, attentive but cool which went well with the overall ambience of the place
Great outdoor patio space, friendly and super helpful staff, limited but interesting food menu,  excellent drinks.
Chicken schnitzel is fantastic

Absolutely LOVE this spot and really praying it's able to make it through this pandemic. No other bar that I've been to in DC has the same feel. When you're here, it feels like you're far away from DC...far more of a european progressive vibe.
Drinks, food and staff are amazing! Loved the place
Great food, cute ambiance & very attentive staff.
Awesome atmosphere, great food, attentive service, but most importantly, mind blowing cocktails! I highly recommend this place! Definitely a must go, if u ask me ❤
Loved the style of the place and signature drinks... I took myself to this spot to enjoy me time once I arrived in DC from.N.Y. Can't wait to visit again and try some of the delicious food.
Love the coffee

Seriously one of the best meals I have ever eaten, no exaggeration, and I think my girlfriend liked it even more than me.  We had the mini gyros, the avocado toast thing, and the grilled octopus. All 3 were outstanding. And make sure to get the cheesecake dessert.  Oh, and it was delivered to our hotel room. Well done! I can’t wait to eat here again!
The ambiance, food and cocktails were superb. The hosts are enforcing social distancing procedures. I dropped a knife and the host arrived with a tray of utensils within minutes. Hidden gem.

We love Residents! Everything from the atmosphere to the staff, but especially the drinks and food! They have the best cocktails and the espresso martinis are a must. Service is always on point, with everyone being just genuinely kind. We stop by anytime we're in the Dupont area.

Great experience on a Saturday night. A place like this is a rare find in downtown area, with tasty food and cocktails, relaxed ambiance and above and beyond customer service that makes you feel welcomed.
Great cocktails amazing food!

We went and sat outside on the patio with a party of four. The vibes (music and decoration) combined with the breeze felt tropical. The delicious cocktails certainly played into that vibe. I had a passion fruit mojito even though it was not listed on the menu. It was excellent and had the perfect amount of lime. For brunch, I had the Turkish Eggs as my main dish. The garlic labneh was a great touch and the spices were perfect. One of the best new brunch dishes I have had in a long time and very original. For dessert, we shared 2 banana breads with the table. I really underestimated how good they would end up being. It was warm and crispy on the outside and has somewhat of a bread pudding/french toast texture to it. My wife had the breakfast sandwich which she raved about and her mother had the feta watermelon salad which she said was super refreshing. Can't wait to go back to try more. I was also sad to hear they were out of the basque cheesecake and I am looking forward to trying that next time because anything with passion fruit is up my alley.

Amazing service, staff are super friendly and knowledgeable! All staff wore masks and the venue seems to adhere to all the policies! The ambience is very chic and cozy. Only reason I’m giving a 4 is because the food was good not great. A bit overpriced for the portions - but that’s just my experience! I didn’t get a pretzel bun only a regular bun and was charged extra for substituting my side - but I’m not mad because the venue and drinks were spot on 👌👌👌

Great vibe. Great service. S/o to Debbie our waitress she was amazing. One of my new favorite places to go in DC. The halibut burger i had was too good and the drinks were excellent. Felt like I was in West Hollywood or the Lower Eastside of Manhattan.

Thank you to Debbie, Marko, Nayef and Radovan for making last minute adjustments and accommodating my party. The food, ambiance and drinks are amazing! The staff is amazing- especially Debbie!  I cant wait to go back and enjoy that delicious fish burger. My new fav dc spot!!!
Love the vibes here.

I visited Residents this morning with two other Chinese female friends.  When the sun came out, a waiter (without a mask) brought several table parasols to the patio for customers who were exposed directly to the strong sunlight. There was one parasol near us, though, covering a vacant table saved intentionally for social distancing. The light was shining into our eyes. We made several attempts to bring the heavy parasol towards us. A waiter who stood 6 feet away from us set up and adjusted another parasol to the benefit of certain other customers, but did not offer to help to us.  Towards noon, the sunlight moved away from our area and towards another area of the patio. Another waiter asked the guests of a table nearby for permission to move their parasol to that area but they said that they preferred to keep it. Then he simply took our parasol away, without asking. (We would have given permission anyway, had he asked.)  The food and cocktails were good, but we don’t know why the waiters were so conspicuously dismissive of and passive-aggressive towards us in particular. The service should be improved.

I probably spend too much time here, but this level of comfort and hospitality is hard to come by these days.  The patio gives strong Mediterranean vibes with the palms and furnishings.  My favorite part about Residents is the music, its the x factor that pushes the experience to next level, it more or less transports me to another place for the time that I am there.  The mid tempo house tunes give me feelings of being at a posh resort. The food and cocktail menu are backed with amazing service from an eager staff that are just as courteous as they are attentive.  Reservations are recommended because patio space is limited and I have highlighted some of my favorite dishes in pictures: watermelon salad, schnitzel and tagliatelle.  If you are not dining, stop by for one of their signature espresso martinis, made with espresso that its brewed to order, they don't disappoint.
Vibe and Music- the best. Cocktails - the best. Food- haven’t tried it yet but heard great things!

Rare to find a place that pays equal amounts of attention to ambiance, cuisine, cocktails and service. Residents nails it. Whether you're craving an afternoon latte or an evening libation, this is the spot you'll want to keep going back to. DC needed a place like this!
Nayef and his team always deliver an outstanding experience while maintaining quality food and over the top cocktails.
One of my favorite places in D.C. Great food and great ambience and their drink menu is amazing! Can't wait to go back!!
Amazing service, amazing cocktails and amazing ambiance!!!
Your one-stop-shop for the BEST food, staff, music, and vibes DC has to offer. 50 stars.

Awesome little niche place with a beautiful and well spaced out front patio. The cocktails here are prime time and the bites to eat are so delish. This is a great spot to share a moment with someone special or even a small little group of friends. 10/10 will be back. Amazing staff and overall a high quality experience.

The greatest addition to DuPont Circle and everything that was missing before. Residents is the one stop shop for everything you could ever need! From a Hot latte to get your day started in the winter to a refreshing cold cocktail and dinner on the ever so dreamy patio in the summer time. The staff, the food, the service, and the experience to name a few — are what have made my trips to Residents a weekly, even sometimes daily thing! 10/10 recommend Residents, also if you’ve never tried an Espresso Martini the ones here will change your life !!
Amazing food, cocktails, ambiance and staff 😍. You really can't go wrong with any of the cocktails. Plus their menu is seasonal so you won't ever run out of things to try!

Lovely ambience, a refreshing food menu with delicious bites, and addicting cocktails (you'll get hooked on the espresso martini). Combine this with first class bartenders and service and there's your answer. Cant think of a better place in dc for pre drinks, don't miss it.
Quality drinks/food and all of the right vibes. Residents is a DC staple!!

The best espresso martinis in Town! Unique vibes and great outdoor patio yo catch up with friends. Management is very professional and always very attentive to their customers. I suggest this place 100%
The professionalism and quality of staff and drinks are top tier. I would recommend a suggestion but then again, you can’t improve perfection
This place is the cutest spot in Dupont. Ambiance is just PERFECT and the food is absolutely delicious!! The Pasta Di Pomodoro is a must!

Lovely cafe and bar that has really become a go-to-spot for my friends and I. The drinks are new, fresh and original. The menu changes seasonally so getting bored is not an option here. (Try the pasta!) The patio is spacious and the decor almost makes you feel as though you’re somewhere by the beach. Inside is the main bar and center of it all- where the magic happens. Downstairs takes you into a cool, speak-easy vibe. You get a feel for everything at Residents. The aesthetic, atmosphere, energy and above all— the employees are fantastic. I feel at home every time I walk in. Must see, must try!
Poppin DC venue with trendy outdoor patio vibe as well. Good and service were both superb. A definite must visit
Poppin DC venue with trendy outdoor patio vibe as well. Good and service were both superb. A definite must visit
Fantastic venue, with amazing food, delectable cocktails, accommodating staff and a fresh vibe. DC’s newest “it” spot!
(Translated by Google) Espresso martini ❤️  (Original) Espresso martini ❤️

I had my very first brunch here after 3 months of covid-19 quarantine. It did not disappoint. Beautiful “social distancing” outdoors patio with great lounge house music in the background. We had burgers and chicken schnitzel sandwich and oh my my my did that first bite hit? It certainly hit our hungry souls and left a huge smile on our faces. We also enjoyed a few cocktails and most definitely recommend their Espresso Martini and Cucumber Cocktail they were to die for. Five stars also goes for their food and drinks presentation, as well as their lovely smiling staff.
The best hangout in DC. From the food, the drinks, to the overall vibe and hospitality, Residents is second to none.

The atmosphere of this place and the music is phenomenal! The service is amazing and the staff is very friendly and accommodating. Definitely order the mezcal espresso martini and the avocado cicchetti during your visit.
Food & ambiance are great! Cooperative staff as well! The only caveat was too tiny tables, not enough for accommodating more than 2 people.

I'm literally here right now and I can't believe how great this place is! I had to review before I finished my appetizers!  The Elder Flower Spritz is BOMB (even though I opted for Kettle because I don't like Gin). The mini Gyros are amazing! The Burger looks delicious (I'm attacking that next) and the ambiance is beautiful!  Wendy, my server, is knowledgeable and very sweet. Kudos to the owners who, like me, decided to build their own brand after spending years in the industry!  Update: Best burger EVER!

Residents is the best Cafe & Bar in DC 100%, all the details make this place my # 1 in many cities. 1. The food is incredible, the chef always make excellent culinary creations that makes a must eat there and try absolutely everything, brunch or dinner, they got your back. 2. Drinks are from beyond good, all the cocktails and the details in all of them make the drinking experience A +.  The Best espresso martini I’ve ever tried in long time. 3. Excellent location and the Decoration is marvelous, trendy and cozy at the same time, makes you feel you Are in a cafe in one of the most exquisite places in the Mediterranean. 4. Every single member of the staff is amazing, cordial and nice and ready to make your experience one of the best you ever had. 5. In these uncertain times they’ve known how to create new concepts and presentations for each item of their menu, making it safe for the customers inside and outside of the restaurant.  Conclusion if you haven’t been at Residents do yourself a favor and go as soon as you can make it, take your family and friends, you are not going to regret it.  The venue is perfect to celebrate any special occasion, enjoy casual drinks & food or even just savor a good espresso.  VM Ja

You’ll feel like you’ve stepped into a chic fashionable European bar/ bistro with inventive fabulous Mediterranean fare and creative takes on traditional cocktails.  Great owners and beautiful ( quiet) outdoor space with handsome corton border.  It will be your  new favorite spot!

I've had brunch here with parents, got late-night drinks with friends, and even just grabbed a coffee. Every time I've loved every detail. The atmosphere is intimate and everything they serve is really good.
Stopped in for a cocktail and the bartender was great. A previous customer ditched before they got their food so they gave it to us for free!
Great spot! Killer bar program, great service!
Amazing
Great music, great north African food and cocktails! Music makes this place unique, after all, an owner is a dj himself!
Perfect for coffee in the morning, delicious and hearty brunch and dinner. Coffee, cocktails or provisions - this place is a hidden gem.
Amazing cocktails and drinks. You absolutely have to try the espresso martinis. The food was INCREDIBLE. Love the vibe and decor - one of my favorite new spots in DuPont.
Fun place

Cozy, warm and calming. Excellent coffee. Great atmosphere. I was having a rather stressful morning, walked in, spent 10 minutes at this place and walked out completely calm and refreshed. The place has an intimate atmosphere, with about 8 bar stools and 4 small tables with plushy seats. More pillows and blanket are waiting on the shelf to be grabbed, if you want to literally curl up wrapped in a blanket. Quiet and pleasant soundtrack playing in the background. Clean, neat. Friendly, charming barista Natasha lights up the place with her smile. This place feels to comfortable, like you've been invited into someone's home - someone who knows you need a moment of peace and quiet. That being said, the cappuccino for 3.75 was perfect. Not bitter, not sour. Just right. Excellent foam. And, without being asked, Natasha gave me a glass of water for the cappuccino, which is a really classy gesture for a barista. Really common for Europe and so common for the US. I'm definitely coming back to this charming place.
Speakeasy vibes with dope cocktails (espresso martinis) and great food (nutella french toast). What more could you ask for? Did I mention the espresos martinis?

One of my favorite new cocktails bars in DC. From a seasonal cocktail selection, delicious small plates, and a knowledgeable staff you’ll be very pleased to visit Residents. Perfect for an evening happy hour spot or for a date, I highly recommend Residents for any occasion.
Great place from some coffee or unique coffee cocktails
I don't take pictures of my food. This place made me throw my values away and decide to do just that. Eat the schnitzel.
Mixed drinks are overpriced, given skills of bartender, but nice venue. Tiny
Nice cocktails

This place is a rare gem. I was introduced by a coworker and went to experience something wonderful. The cocktails are out of this world and the bartenders are so fun to watch. I used to run a bar and I was impressed. I say this place is a must go visit in DC. You can thank me later !
Great food,great coctails!Love this place!
Marco just gave us an impromptu coffee liqueur tasting, but that’s not why this is my fav bar
Nice whiskey selection. Cozy, relaxing spot for a drink with friends.
Good vibe.  Cool music, great service and delicious food.  New favorite spot in Dupont
Best service ever! Best cocktails in town!!!! B e s t!!!
Great spot for small groups to have intimate conversations and great drinks. The music was also very good and the staff was outstanding! Will definitely be back.
Amazing place, i cannot recommend it enough. Staff is really capable and friendly. Food and drinks are real high quality and prepared with care and lots attention to detail :)

Residents Cafe is a gem in Dupont Circle. Tucked in between other rowhomes, it's a small cafe with a bar and a few seats in the back. During the day, it's a coffee shop with wifi. In the evening, it becomes a cocktail bar with food.  To start, the space is beautiful. It's simply decorated and it works. There's patio seating in the front. If you sit at the bar, you'll enjoy the views no matter where you turn. It's a cute space.  The service is impeccable. The bartender was friendly and quickly made us quality drinks and food. My spritz was excellent, refreshing, and large.  The fries were perfectly cooked as well as the avocado chiccette. I'd go back for sure!

Beautiful interior and patio, cozy and well lit with tons of plants. The bourbon espresso martini was the most amazing combination of booze, espresso, and chocolate I have ever had. We also had the salmon tartine and avocado toast and both blew me away with their presentation and fantastic fresh and flavorful ingredients. To top it off, the service was excellent - attentive and friendly. I will definitely be back!
Local vibe with amazing food and cocktails.  Can't wait to try out basement club when it is finished.
Great, intimate spot. Try the espresso martini!

This place is amazing. It’s intimate and cozy, great chill music, and the bartenders are super friendly. The food menu is perfect—not too complex, but just enough flavors for whatever you might be in the mood for. The cocktail menu? Fantastic. Get the espresso martini. So much attention to detail. This place is one of my new favorite places, it’s a hidden gem. Great for lunch and coffee, or happy hour and small bites.
Ghee and glee in an espresso martini!
Best new bar in DC!

Just want to say that I'm really picky person when's come to having a "Good " cocktail, and this place... One word AWESOME. If you are  visiting DC ,like i do , your next stop after visiting White House  MUST be here. Friendly stuff will boost your mood on highest level!
Delicious foods and cocktails
Geat service. Tasty meal. Enjoyed the smashed advocado alot.
Great drinks, great creative food, great attentive staff, beautiful decor, a perfect place for HH, light dinner or just a nightcap.
Amazing food, service and environment!

Choosing a great bar can make or break your fun. If you appreciate quality booze, perfectly curated cocktails, amazing food, and owners who work on ensuring the little details are noticed during your time there .. then this is the place...  Great vibe, modern house music, and ice cubes that make you contemplate learning the trade yourself. Come see these guys at Residents Cafe & Bar.  Tell them you want the King Sean.. Beluga with Lemon...
Great coffee and staff.

Residents is a great addition to Dupont Circle. The staff is warm and welcoming, and the food and drinks are delicious. It has an intimate vibe, where you feel like you're amongst friends. They've got you covered for brunch, happy hour or a night out. It's the perfect neighborhood spot.

LOVE this new establishment! Hip and chic decor, delicious cocktails and food, and great service! Their happy hour and brunch menu are to die for and sitting outside in the calming and green outdoor seating oasis is a treat.

Took over 10 minutes to even get a menu, and 30 minutes before we got our wines. We were planning on getting food too but the service was so terrible we needed to get out of there. Really wanted to like this place!
Awesome place the ambience it’s perfect the food and the drinks just something wonderful. A different place for sure.
Cute atmosphere, creative menu, and friendly staff. Nice addition to dupont
Great place to come and chill and absorb the DC vibe any night!!
Hands down the best cafè and cocktail bar in DC! Vibes for dayssss
Awesome atmosphere, definitely would come back
Residents is the perfect hangout. The decor is lovely, the cocktails are well done, and the vibe is relaxed. It is a much needed addition to the neighborhood.
Easily the best bar and Cafe in the area. Superb cocktails, great atmosphere, scrumptious food.
Elegant drinks that are both creative and generous;  friendly staff; interesting food in a great location.  Will go back again .....and again.
Excellent cocktails, delicious food (if you’re hungry and reading this order the octopus) (nvm... order the octopus even if you’re not hungry) the staff is super friendly and fun. 👌🏼

Residents offers a delicious selection of cocktails and dishes, tasteful design, great music, and some of the friendliest staff, at a fraction of the cost of other places with similar quality. It's definitely a new favorite spot! Highly recommend!
Espresso Martini, Pasta, charcuterie board, Steak and everything else on the menu is phenomenal! Going to go back very soon.
Great cocktail bar with outdoor seating, friendly staff and incredible drinks.

Seriously cannot say enough good things about this place! All three twists on the espresso martini are out of this world - such creative spins on a classic! Highly recommend the bourbon espresso martini, and also, the Strawberry, another one of their cocktails - incredibly refreshing.  The aesthetic of the place is really cool too - exposed brick walls, beautiful bars, pops of a pale/mint green for contrast. Loved it and definitely adding it to my list of regular go-tos, both for their coffee and food in the daytime (YUM), and their cocktails.
New DC favorite! Great service, food and design. A must see

What a beautiful addition to the neighborhood, chic and tasteful, both on the outside and inside! I really love the healthy and savory options on the menu, and the staff was super attentive and accommodating. I can't wait to come back for more!
Great food, great service, amazing drinks, amazing prices
Great atmosphere and delicious drinks. The best espresso martinis DC has to offer.
Spent all night and never looked back - great vibe

Lots to love about Residents, from the daytime cafe to top notch craft cocktails at night, a beautiful layout and design, and some of the best and most eclectic music in DC. To say it’s the best offering in Dupont, from open to close, is an understatement.
this place is beautiful - great vibes, great drinks. 5/5!
